prompt.prompt:
Match each dot plot below with the histogram that was made from the same dataset. 
 Be sure to sort all 8 cards.

A teacher surveys her students on how many hours of TV they watch per week. 

 ![](./hours-dist.png) 

 How many students did the teacher survey?

A teacher surveys her students on how many hours of TV they watch per week. 

 ![](./hours-dist.png) 

 How many students watch 13 hours of TV per week?

A teacher surveys her students on how many hours of TV they watch per week. 

 ![](./hours-dist.png) 

 How many students watch fewer than 4 hours of TV per week?

The histogram below shows the distribution of times it took a group of women to run a mile. 

 ![](./run-dist.png) 

 Check all of the statements below that are True.
distractors: The number of women in the sample who could run a mile in under 10 minutes is six.
A total of 9 women were in the sample.
A total of 16 women were in the sample.
The fastest time to run a mile was 9 minutes.
3 women took 16 minutes to run a mile.

answer: A total of 40 women were in the sample.
The majority of the women in the sample could run a mile in under 11.5 minutes.
1 woman ran the mile in under 7 minutes.
